body:
@adonisues  As noted in your figure, you can setup an LSTM with `<s> w1 w2 </s>`, and another LSTM with `</s> w2 w1 <s>`, simply concatenating their outputs is enough for a *type 1* bi-directional LSTM.

@csarofeen  the output of `l0` consists of the outputs of both directions (3 * 2) in `l0`, and `12 = 4(gates) * 3(hidden)`,  then `(12, 6)` makes sense. At the same time the hidden states of two directions in `l1` are independent so we have `(12, 3)` .
